block.p: The Department of Defense has identified 2,869 American service members who have died since the start of the Iraq war. It recently confirmed the deaths of the following Americans:

DAVENPORT, James R., 20, Lance Cpl., Marines; Danville, Ind.; Third Marine Division. LEDSOME, Michael C., 24, Cpl., Marines; Austin, Tex.; Second Marine Division. MORENO, Reece D., 19, Pvt., Army; Prescott, Ariz.; Third Infantry Division. PRIESTAP, James D., 39, Sgt. First Class, Army; Harwood, Mich.; 46th Military Police Company. RAPAVI, Nicholas P., 22, Cpl., Marines; Springfield, Va.; Second Marine Division. WARNER, Heath D., 19, Pvt., Marines; Canton, Ohio; Third Marine Division. WATTS, Donovan E., 46, Command Sgt. Maj., Army; Atlanta; 82nd Airborne Division. WEST, Jeromy D., 20, Lance Cpl., Marines; Aguanga, Calif.; Third Marine Division.
The Department of Defense has identified 2,869 American service members who have died since the start of the Iraq war. It recently confirmed the deaths of the following Americans:.
